name: Laid Back Camp: Have A Nice Day
name_original: Laid Back Camp: Have A Nice Day
description: Yuru CampΔ Have a nice day! (「ゆるキャン△ Have a nice day!」) is a visual novel video game developed and published by MAGES for the Nintendo Switch and Sony PS4 in Japan. The game was originally announced to be released on September 30, 2021, but was delayed until November 11, 2021.
